Keylon Codes serve to direct the in-ﬂow and out-ﬂow of Partiki unit energy within the morphogenetic blueprint of a form into more specific patterns, rhythms of movement and electro-tonal vibration. All forms of matter and conscious- ness are structured upon specific sets of Keylon Codes that determine the base atomic and genetic makeup of a form and the characteristics of consciousness the form will possess.
